thread.title: Police update on deadly pedestrian bridge collapse in Miami

title: Police update on deadly pedestrian bridge collapse in Miami
text:
Police update on deadly pedestrian bridge collapse in Miami 12:51am IST - 00:44 
A pedestrian bridge collapsed on Thursday at Florida International University in western Miami Dade County, and local media reports said several people were hurt and cars were trapped beneath the structure. Rough Cut
